original_prompt: /ultrawork Update all code examples and developer documentation to use our app's tech stack format, but with CORRECT brand token values:  ## Tech Stack (format for ALL code examples) - **Framework**: SvelteKit 5 with Svelte 5 runes ($props, $derived, $effect) - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4 + SCSS modules - **No React** — replace any React/JSX examples with Svelte  ## Correct Token Values (use these exact names and values) ```scss // _variables.scss (CORRECT tokens) $pearl-white: #FBFBFB; $midnight-violet: #0B0425; $platinum: #F0F0F0; $royal-violet: #6A00D5; $lavender: #F4EFFF;  // Semantic $success: #006A4E; $warning: #B45309; $error: #DE350B; ``` ```css /* CSS Custom Properties */ --color-pearl: #FBFBFB; --color-midnight: #0B0425; --color-platinum: #F0F0F0; --color-violet: #6A00D5; --color-lavender: #F4EFFF;  --color-success: #006A4E; --color-warning: #B45309; --color-error: #DE350B; ```  Do NOT use --color1, --color2, etc. Use semantic names.  ## Typography - Font: DM Sans (Google Fonts) - Default weight: 500 - Show responsive headings using clamp()  ## Dark Mode - Class-based toggle: `.dark` on `:root` - Show how tokens change in dark mode  ## Component Examples in Svelte 5 syntax: ```svelte <script>   let { variant = 'primary' } = $props(); </script>  <button class="btn-{variant}">   <slot /> </button> ```  ## Radius Scale - --radius-sm: 4px - --radius-md: 8px - --radius-lg: 16px - --radius-xl: 24px  ## What to Update 1. CSS Tokens page — SCSS vars + CSS custom properties (correct names) 2. Colors page — show correct token mapping 3. Typography page — clamp() responsive sizing examples 4. All component examples — Svelte 5, not React 5. Dark Mode page — class-based .dark implementation 6. Downloads — provide tokens.scss with correct values  ## Critical - Use CORRECT brand token names from this prompt - Use Svelte/SCSS/Tailwind FORMAT from our app stack - The developer will copy these into a SvelteKit project - Don't mix old --color1 naming with new guidelines
